concept.title: Using Runtime Resources
concept.shortdesc: Use the runtime:loadResource function to call a runtime resource. You can use runtime resources to represent sensitive information in any stage or pipeline property that allows the use of the expression language.

conbody.p: runtime resourcesusing in a pipelineTo call a runtime property, use the following syntax:

For example, the following expression returns the password for a JDBC Consumer origin. The file is named JDBCpassword.txt and is restricted so only the owner can read the file:${runtime:loadResource("JDBCpassword.txt", true)
